prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant red and yellow colors and elegant wings.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the forest with bright colors and a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a creature that has a playful personality and can fly gracefully through gardens and meadows.
Make a small, insect-like Pokemon with a unique blend of colors that stands out among its peers.
Imagine a Pokemon with stunning wings and a friendly nature that thrives in urban settings.
Design a Pokemon that combines beauty and agility, perfect for battling in the wild.
Show me a whimsical bug Pokemon with a striking appearance and a knack for evasion.

distinctive_features: Wings resembling those of a ladybug
